name: Freeze Frame (Captainspacecat)
description:
Welcome to Freeze Frame, a short puzzle game I made during the pandemic in which you control time to solve puzzles and avoid enemies!

Controls:

C to freeze and unfreeze time

While time is frozen, Z to reverse, X to replay

V to grab and release boxes

Shift will activate Sigil blocks, and if you hold Shift your character will cling to the side of them to avoid falling

Code: https://github.com/CaptainSpaceCat/Freeze-Frame
